name: Make Them Fight!
description:
This game was made for the wowie jam.

The topic of the jam was "Everything interacs with everything"

So in this game there are red enemies that atack you; but if by accident one enemy shoot another, the other will get angre and will atack the enemy that atacked him
There are also PowerUps but the enemies can also take them

You are the black square and you move with the WASD or the keyboard arrows and aim and shoot with the mouse

Enjoy!
